body:
Comment 13: 
Sorry but that doesn't answer the question: I also want to know what ctx is. I don't
need the full method code, just the type method, and the snippets of all functions that
produces the values involved in the crash:
- how is ctx allocated, how is it passed as argument, what is its exact type (with full
definition)
- how is the safestore put in the ctx, etc.
